data — Property, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClientEvent
Any data retrieved in the NitroLM call will be stored here.

Used internally by EncryptedModuleLoader and EncryptedModuleManager to decrypt and load encrypted SWF modules completely in native code

disableLicense(productCode:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method disables the license already retrieved for the currently active user.
dispose() — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
Call this method before closing your AIR application to dispose of the native ExtensionContext
